sentence.Network_en: This is called an azimuthal projection.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种投影称作方位投影.

sentence.Network_en: Here we distinguish azimuthal and equatorial mountings as well as fixed and transportable instruments.
sentence.Network_cn: 比如说有地平式和赤道式装置,有固定式和移动式的等等.

sentence.Network_en: If the first axis is perpendicular to the ground we speak of an azimuthal mounting.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果第一根轴与地面垂直,就称为地平式支架.
